website_summaries.verdict: Reebok Fury Adapt UC is adored for its aesthetics appeal and overall comfort it gives to the feet. Its uniquely built midfoot caging system does its function as it helps secure the feet. The cushiony bed inside shoe offers good padding for the feet while keeping it dry most of the time. Although its cleatie construction and no-fuss lacing system provides the convenience of slipping in and out of this shoe, some had issues with its ability to stretch.
pros: Most of the reviewers found the Reebok Fury Adapt UC comfortable after picking a half-size higher than their natural size
A wear tester with a wide foot thought the plastic cage would get in the way of comfort but surprised that it is bendable enough providing a secure fit for enhanced stability
The Fury Adapt UC is built with a shiny TPU cage that reinforces the shape of the shoe, according to several users
The midfoot caging system averts the foot from slipping to the edges of the shoe, described by one buyer
The pull tabs do good work as help in putting this shoe on with ease, according to quite a lot of wearers
The removable Ortholite insole is cushiony and keeps feet from getting too sweaty, described in several reviews
Its Hexalite technology which is visible on the heel when the shoe is flipped over offers remarkable shock-absorption, as mentioned by more than a few wearers
The EVA foam midsole offers plenty of comfort, especially when using this sneaker for a lengthy time
The rubber on the outsole is tough yet allows the feet to bend with ease
cons: The mesh upper creases when tightening up its quick-pull lacing system
Several reviewers mentioned having difficulty sliding their feet into this shoe
Those with high instep feel that this sneaker is squeezing their foot too tight
A nice looking shoe but a number of those with wide feet had issues squeezing their foot through the cleatie upper
Not an ideal shoe for summer as its upper can get too warm for the feet

customer_reviews.title: Nice appearing, but small and difficult to get on.
customer_reviews.text: Way too small / tight. I ordered a half size larger than I normally wear, and usually need a B or C width. I could hardly get them on after stuggling. They have laces, but it only looses the shoe up a small amount since it doesn't have a tongue flap like other shoes. They look good, but what use is that if you can't get them on without a shoe spoon and a lot of effort?
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: for me more comfortable this one (reebok Fury adapt)
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 rebooks shoes. This one and print 2.0. Personally, for me more comfortable this one (reebok Fury adapt). But it's not for hot summer - really)) And i agree that it's better to order half size or size bigger. They are small fit. My size is 10 but i bought 10.5 which is strange for reeebok. 10.5 fit nice. Yes, it's very comfortable, very stylish but as already noted, you will not be able to dress them on without shoe spoon! First time the finger rested then trampled
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reebok’s Rock!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this exact item three times now. I love the slip on fit, color and enduring appearance that takes twice as long to show wear than all other major brands. They’re great at the gym, on the track and even with a fitted suit you’re dressing down. I’m thinking of ordering a few more pairs, so I’m sure to have new ones when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Doug A

customer_reviews.title: foot looks Great feels awful
customer_reviews.text: these are a slide on shoe laces. are for looks if you tighten them the fabric bunches up into wrinkles and looks awful length is ok the inside area loose around. foot looks Great feels awful
customer_reviews.author: robert bush

customer_reviews.title: Buy them 1/2 size bigger than normal
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning these as they seem to run 1/2 size small.
customer_reviews.author: bq

customer_reviews.title: They look great though.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to squeeze my foot in the shoe but I was unsuccessful. I'm going to buy some thinner socks and try again. You need to have a narrow foot to fit. They look great though.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bad John

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! I have about 20 pairs of different ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! I have about 20 pairs of different sneakers and this one is became one of my favorite after they coming. I love how they look like, like their materials. Just great pair of shoes)
customer_reviews.author: Lil 50

customer_reviews.title: U need an anorexic foot to get these on I ...
customer_reviews.text: U need an anorexic foot to get these on I got a whole size bigger an I still couldn't get them on
customer_reviews.author: RaZa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good shoe but it's not designed for everyone especially if you have a wide feet
customer_reviews.author: RahimN

customer_reviews.title: A bit tight
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good which cost $25 us. Better order with half size bigger. A bit tight for me with size 11.
customer_reviews.author: markochan

customer_reviews.title: My original size is 11 but I recommend you one up or 1/2 your normal size
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this product and had issues with it. I had to order a new pair. My original size is 11 but I recommend you one up or 1/2 your normal size. Since these shoes are kinda tight. They do look beautiful tho, and have awesome comfort, again order one size up or 1/2 or your toes will suffer since the thin design needs breaking in but still a tight fit. Again, please... I cannot stress this enough for new customers... one up or 1/2 your original size. The shoes are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel G.

customer_reviews.title: no thanks
customer_reviews.text: no movable tongue and laces are just for show i couldnt get them on they went for cheap but im disabled and too much work to try and get them on i sent trhem back
customer_reviews.author: thomas burke

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately they fit perfectly since I usually order a half ...
customer_reviews.text: Normally I check reviews and sizing to see if things run smaller or larger. Forgot to do that with this one. Fortunately they fit perfectly since I usually order a half size up anyway. I haven't had a pair of shoes bought online fit this comfortably out of the box in a while. The blue was true to what was advertised as well. Like others have said, order a half size larger than normal. Especially if you plan to be active in these.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, I can go for hours standing with these ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a slip on shoe, but they've added laces to hide that feature. Its hard to get into, but you can expect to break into these over a couple of weeks. Very comfortable, I can go for hours standing with these on. But they don't have as much grip, especially on smooth surfaces, so that can be a bummer for some.
customer_reviews.author: Mihir N Bhagat

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Fury Adapt UC Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: Fashion never felt so good. These Reebok fury looks great and feel fabulous. The canvas upper is right on trend, and the visible technology in the midsole adds lightweight shock absorption.
feature_bullets: Hexalite visible technology window in outsole
